title: Mobile UI Component Library Selection Decision Required
question: Which React UI component library should we use for the mobile-first PWA ERP system?

context.primary_user: Business owner on mobile phone (90% of operations)
context.desktop_usage: Critical for reports, dashboards, admin tasks
critical_requirements: Record sale in < 30 seconds on mobile
Work on 320px-428px mobile screens AND desktop
context.bundle_constraint: React is 165-200KB, UI library must be optimized

human_response.reasoning: Owner selected Mantine UI after evaluating it against the original recommendation of Ant Design Mobile. Key factors: single library for both mobile and desktop, smallest bundle size (70-200KB), English documentation, built-in ERP components (data grid, forms, charts), excellent React 18 + Vite support.
accepted_tradeoffs: Need to build custom bottom navigation component (2-3 days)
No pre-built mobile-specific patterns like antd-mobile
Newer library than Material-UI (but mature and stable)
mitigation_plan: Use Mantine's AppShell + Drawer for responsive navigation
Build custom bottom nav using Mantine components (2-3 days)
Leverage useMediaQuery hook for responsive behavior
Use built-in data grid, forms, charts for ERP features

resolution_notes: Business owner chose Mantine UI over both the original recommendation (Ant Design Mobile) and other options (Chakra UI, Material-UI). Decision optimizes for: single library for mobile+desktop, smallest bundle size, English docs, minimal timeline impact (0-7 days). Scored 9.20/10 - highest of all options evaluated.
next_steps: Update DECISIONS.md with DEC-P02: UI Library = Mantine UI
Document mobile component build plan (bottom nav, etc.)
Plan responsive layout strategy with AppShell
Proceed to next research: Offline Storage Strategy
